titlestmt.titleproper: Survey of the John Chamberlain papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-04-20T11:34-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Data cleanup via script: updated the author of the finding aid; removed tags from languageOfFindingAid; added catkey; updated Prefered Citation; updated Accruals statement

did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, and printed matter, relating to world affairs, American politics, economic conditions in the United States, conservative political philosophy, and laissez-faire economics. Most of the material consists of drafts and printed copies of newspaper columns and other writings by Chamberlain.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The remainder of the collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least two business days in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John Chamberlain papers, [Box no., Folder no. or title], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1986.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at https://searchworks.stanford.edu. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, correspondence, and printed matter, relating to world affairs, American politics, economic conditions in the United States, conservative political philosophy, and laissez-faire economics. Most of the material consists of drafts and printed copies of newspaper columns and other writings by Chamberlain.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes letters, notes, clippings sent to and from Chamberlain.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes newspaper clippings, receipts of articles, notes, reviews, drafts, publications and research associated with Chamberlain and by other authors.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes invitations, records of events, awards and other documents related to events attended by Chamberlain.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content note
scopecontent.p: Includes an assortment of notes, research, correspondence, undated publications, etc. from Chamberlain and other writers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes oversized magazines and newspaper prints.
